ItemAttachment.Name: Jury Rigged (Weapon)
ItemAttachment.Description: [H3]Jury Rigged (Weapon)[h3] Activation: Passive Ranked: Yes Trees: Gunner The character chooses one personal weapon or piece of armor per rank of Jury Rigged. He may increase the damage of the weapon by one; decrease the Advantage cost on its Critical, or any single other effect by one to a minimum of one; or increase armor's ranged or melee defense by one. Alternatively, he can decrease the encumbrance of the item by two to a minimum of one. The bonus only applies so long as the character is using the item. If the item is ever lost or destroyed, the character may apply Jury Rigged to a new personal weapon or piece or armor.

Sources.Source: Edge of the Empire Core Rulebook

ItemAttachment.Name: Jury Rigged (Armor)
ItemAttachment.Description: [H3]Jury Rigged (Armor)[h3] Activation: Passive Ranked: Yes Trees: Gunner The character chooses one personal weapon or piece of armor per rank of Jury Rigged. He may increase the damage of the weapon by one; decrease the Advantage cost on its Critical, or any single other effect by one to a minimum of one; or increase armor's ranged or melee defense by one. Alternatively, he can decrease the encumbrance of the item by two to a minimum of one. The bonus only applies so long as the character is using the item. If the item is ever lost or destroyed, the character may apply Jury Rigged to a new personal weapon or piece or armor.

Sources.Source: Edge of the Empire Core Rulebook

ItemAttachment.Name: Augmented Spin Barrel
ItemAttachment.Description: [H3]Augmented Spin Barrel[h3] Using an updated and streamlined Galven pattern and heavy-duty static pulse adapters, this custom barrel increases both the damage output and armor penetration of blaster rifles and heavy blaster rifles. The trade-off for all this extra stopping power is increased wear-and-tear on both the frame of the blaster and the barrel, leading to an increase in maintenance and down-time. This attachment can only be used with blaster rifles and heavy blaster rifles. Models Include: Dolmax 242X "Penetrator" Augmented Spin Barrel, Arakyd HH780 HotShot Barrel, BlasTech Model 21 3 Perforator Barrel. Base Modifiers: Increases weapon damage by 1. Adds [SE] to all Mechanics checks when performing maintenance on this weapon. Modification Options: 2 Damage +1 Mods, 1 Weapon Quality (Accurate + 1) Mod, 1 Weapon Quality (Pierce +1) Mod. Hard Points Required: 2 Price: 1,750 credits.

Sources.Source: Edge of the Empire Core Rulebook

Mod.MiscDesc: Add [SETBACK] to all Mechanics checks when performing maintenance on this weapon.

ItemAttachment.Name: Balanced Hilt
ItemAttachment.Description: [H3]Balanced Hilt[h3] Good balance is a key component in any melee weapon. Professional weaponsmiths use modern, ultra-light materials to create a weapon that is not only lighter, but also more accurate in the hands of a skilled user. This attachment can be applied to any bladed weapon. Models Include: None Base Modifiers: Grants the weapon the Accurate (+ 1) quality. Modification Options: 1 Weapon Quality (Accurate + 1) Mod, 1 Decrease encumbrance of weapon by one to a minimum of one Mod. Hard Points Required: 2 Price: 1.500 credits.

Sources.Source: Edge of the Empire Core Rulebook

ItemAttachment.Name: Blaster Actuating Module
ItemAttachment.Description: [H3]Blaster Actuating Module[h3] Actuating modules are blaster modifications popular with mercenaries, bounty hunters, and anyone needing to make the first strike count. Adaptable to nearly any blaster pistol, this attachment is a simple upgraded blaster actuating module with custom firmware and a stronger electromagnetic accelerator that provides more powerful and more penetrating blaster shots. Unfortunately, this excess power takes its toll on the weapon; blasters so modified tend to develop reliability problems the longer they are used with this attachment. This attachment is only for use on Ranged (Light) blaster pistols. Models Include: Dolmax Heavy Blaster Actuator, Arakyd 97R Enhanced Blaster Actuating Module, SoroSuub X440 "Hammer" Blaster Actuating Module. Base Modifiers: Increases weapon damage by 1. Adds • to all checks made when using this weapon. Modification Options: 2 Damage +1 Mods, 2 Weapon Quality (Pierce + 1) Mods. Hard Points Required: 1. Price: 500 credits.

Sources.Source: Edge of the Empire Core Rulebook

ItemAttachment.Name: Stun-Only Blaster Modification
ItemAttachment.Description: [H3]Stun-Only Blaster Modification[h3] Add this attachment to any blaster pistol or carbine to make it stun-only. A blaster with this modification costs half the normal price.

Sources.Source: Edge of the Empire Core Rulebook

ItemAttachment.Name: Bipod Mount
ItemAttachment.Description: [H3]Bipod Mount[h3] Little more than a pair of folding or collapsible legs mounted beneath the barrel of a long arm, bipods are used to stabilize awkward or heavy weapons to improve their firing characteristics. Especially useful when firing from behind low cover or from a prone position, bipods are typically used on squad support weapons, or by sharpshooters and snipers to better steady their weapons. This attachment can only be applied to rifles, carbines, and light repeating blasters, and takes one preparation maneuver to set up. Models Include: Czerka AA20 Marksman Bipod, Galactic Arms XA Classic Bipod. Base Modifiers: Decreases weapon's Cumbersome rating by 2 when firing from a prone or crouched position (or can otherwise brace the bipod). Modification Options: None. Hard Points Required: 1 Price: 100 credits.

Sources.Source: Edge of the Empire Core Rulebook

ItemAttachment.Name: Bowcaster Re-Cocker
ItemAttachment.Description: [H3]Bowcaster Re-Cocker[h3] Please see page 189 of the Edge of the Empire Core Rulebook for details.
ItemAttachment.Source: Edge of the Empire Core Rulebook

Mod.MiscDesc: Removes reloading maneuver requirement from bowcaster.

ItemAttachment.Name: Bowcaster Accelerator Enhancement
ItemAttachment.Description: [H3]Bowcaster Accellerator Enhancement[h3] Please see page 189 of the Edge of the Empire Core Rulebook for details.
ItemAttachment.Source: Edge of the Empire Core Rulebook

ItemAttachment.Name: Filed Front Sight
ItemAttachment.Description: [H3]Filed Front Sight[h3] An old assassin's trick, this is the simple act of removing the front sight of a blaster pistol via filing it off. A common modification to holdout blasters, along with removing their serial numbers, filing down the weapon's front sight allows it to be drawn more quickly from its holster and reduces the possibility of it becoming snared on clothing. Unfortunately, while this modification makes for easy concealment and drawing, it also reduces the weapon's accuracy, as it effectively makes it impossible to aim with any amount of precision. This modification may only be applied to pistol-sized weapons. Doing the work oneself requires an Average ( [DI] [DI] ) Mechanics Check. The listed price is used when paying someone else to perform the work. Models Include: None. Base Modifiers: Innate Talent (Quick Draw). Increases difficulty of combat checks to hit targets at ranges beyond short range by 1. Modification Options: 1 Decreases the difficulty of checks to conceal the weapon by 1 Mod. Hard Points Required: 1. Price: 25 credits.

Sources.Source: Edge of the Empire Core Rulebook

Mod.MiscDesc: Increases the difficulty of combat checks to hit targets at ranges beyond Short range by one.
Decreases the difficulty of checks to conceal the weapon by one.

ItemAttachment.Name: Forearm Grip
ItemAttachment.Description: [H3]Forearm Grip[h3] Little more than a vertical handgrip affixed below the barrel of a rifle-sized weapon, these are very popular modifications among mercenaries and professional soldiers across the galaxy. Designed to give the user better control over the weapon, especially in tight quarters, this attachment is often paired with a spread barrel attachment to optimize blaster rifles for closequarters combat. This attachment can only be used on rifle and carbine-sized weapons (but not heavy rifles). Models Include: Dolmax 14A Detachable Pistol Grip, Galactic Arms Model 9 Forearm Grip, Merr-Sonn AG44S Ergonomic Tactical Foregrip. Base Modifiers: Decreases the additional difficulty of making Ranged (Heavy) checks with this weapon while engaged to an additional [DI] (rather than [DI] [DI]). Modification Options: 1 Innate Talent (Point Blank Rank + 1) Mod, 1 Weapon Quality (Accurate + 1) Mod. Hard Points Required: 1 Price: 250 credits.

Sources.Source: Edge of the Empire Core Rulebook

Mod.MiscDesc: Decreases the additional difficulty of making Ranged (Heavy) checks with this weapon while engaged to an additional [DIFFICULTY] (rather than [DIFFICULTY][DIFFICULTY]).

ItemAttachment.Name: Marksman Barrel
ItemAttachment.Description: [H3]Marksman Barrel[h3] Marksman barrels are designed to meet the needs of soldiers for whom long range accuracy is a necessity. Popular among bounty hunters and assassins, this barrel is nearly two meters long and made of lightweight materials. It features upgraded static pulse adapters as well as a denser Galven circuitry pattern, which not only increases the weapon's range but also its accuracy. The trade-off for this increased range and accuracy is a weapon that's slightly awkward to use and nearly impossible to conceal due to the length of the barrel. This modification may only be applied to blaster rifles. Models Include: Merr-Sonn KX756 Marksman Barrel, SoroSuub WQ80 "Long-shot" Barrel, Arakyd 3300 Hawkeye Sharpshooter's Barrel. Base Modifiers: Increases weapon's range by one range band. The weapon gains the Cumbersome 2 quality. Modification Options: 2 Weapon Quality (Accurate +1) Mods, 1 Innate Talent (Sniper Shot) Mod. Hard Points Required: 2. Price: 1,200 credits.

Sources.Source: Edge of the Empire Core Rulebook

ItemAttachment.Name: Mono-Molecular Edge
ItemAttachment.Description: [H3]Mono-Molecular Edge[h3] All bladed weapons, even powerful vibro weapons, can benefit from an edge sharpened to molecular thickness and toughened through laser-forging techniques. This modification may be applied to melee weapons that use a cutting edge. Models Include: None. Base Modifiers: Decreases the weapon's crit rating by 1 to a minimum of 1. Modification Options: 2 Weapon Quality (Pierce + 1) Mods. Hard Points Required: 1. Price: 1,000 credits.

Sources.Source: Edge of the Empire Core Rulebook

ItemAttachment.Name: Multi-Optic Sight
ItemAttachment.Description: [H3]Multi-Optic Sight[h3] A complex and sophisticated piece of equipment, the multi-optic sight is a wonder of modern sensor technology. Marketed to the discriminating professional soldier, each consists of a bulky on-weapon A optic equipped with numerous types of sensors, K including low-light, thermal, ultrasound, millimeter wave emitters, video capture, and common optical enhancements. The optic is connected to a pair of goggles worn by the user by a reinforced fiber-optic cable that transmits the vision enhancements directly to the user in real time. This allows the user to see his targets in inclement conditions like smoke, foe and darkness. With some clever use, users can see around corners, under obstacles, and over cover. This attachment can be fit to any ranged weapon. Models Include: Galactic Arms Model 44 Combat Optical Enhancer, Merr-Sonn 480.zl "Beholder" Multi- Optic Sight, SoroSuub XAD Omnisight. Base Modifiers: Removes up to [SE] [SE] on any checks to use this weapon due to smoke, darkness, or other environmental conditions that obstruct vision. Modification Options: 2 Skill (Perception) Mods. Hard Points Required: 1. Price: 2,000 credits.

Sources.Source: Edge of the Empire Core Rulebook

Mod.MiscDesc: Removes up to [SETBACK][SETBACK] on any checks to use this weapon due to smoke, darkness, or other environmental conditions that obstruct vision.

ItemAttachment.Name: Spread Barrel
ItemAttachment.Description: [H3]Spread Barrel[h3] Commonly applied to blaster rifles and carbines, spread barrels are often used by members of the Rebel Alliance. Designed with the kind of close-quarters combat encountered in buildings and starship corridors in mind, this attachment replaces a blaster's stock barrel with one that is shorter, bulkier, broader, and equipped with a built-in flash hider. Using a stepped array of prismatic crystals, located at the end of the barrel just behind the crown, and a reconfigured Galven pattern, this barrel splits the blaster's beam into a number of smaller beams that exit the barrel in a spray or fan-like pattern. Used in a tightly packed space, such as a ship's corridor, these beams can strike multiple targets with one pull of the trigger. The trade-off for this, however, is a reduction in the weapon's range. This attachment can only be applied to blaster rifles and blaster carbines. Models Include: BlasTech 8405 "Scattergun" Spread Barrel, SoroSuub 800 "Blunderbuss" Barrel, Arakyd Model 70 "Chain Lightning" Spread Barrel. Base Modifiers: Grants weapon quality Blast (4). Reduces weapon's range by one range band to a minimum of engaged. Modification Options: 2 Blast + 1 Mods. Hard Points Required: 2. Price: 1,725 credits.

Sources.Source: Edge of the Empire Core Rulebook

ItemAttachment.Name: Serrated Edge
ItemAttachment.Description: [H3]Serrated Edge[h3] This is a simple and vicious modification commonly made to bladed weapons to increase their damage output. It simply alters the blade to give it a jagged, tearing edge that ensures extremely traumatic damage to flesh and bone. This modification may be applied to melee weapons that use a cutting edge. Models Include: None. Base Modifiers: Grants the weapon the Vicious (+ 1) Quality. Modification Options: None. Hard Points Required: 1. Price: 50 credits.

Sources.Source: Edge of the Empire Core Rulebook

ItemAttachment.Name: Superior Weapon Customization
ItemAttachment.Description: [H3]Superior Weapon Customization[h3] Even the simplest weapon can benefit from a master craftsman's touch. A skilled weaponsmith can adjust a weapon to its owner's exacting specifications, increasing its performance and handling well above that of a stock weapon. Base Modifiers: Grants the weapon the Superior quality. Modification Options: None. Hard Points Required: 1 Price: 5,000 credits.

Sources.Source: Edge of the Empire Core Rulebook

ItemAttachment.Name: Shortened Barrel
ItemAttachment.Description: [H3]Shortened Barrel[h3] Shortened barrels are a handy modification used by spies, plain-clothes law enforcement officers, or anyone needing to conceal the fact that they're carrying a weapon. Little more than a shorter-than-stock replacement barrel, this attachment makes concealing a pistol on one's person much easier than usual. As an added bonus, the short barrel can, with some practice, make the act of drawing the weapon quicker and easier. This attachment can only be applied to Ranged (Light) pistol weapons. Models Include: Arakyd SB4 "Stubber," SoroSuub SBSS Reduced Length Barrel. Base Modifiers: Reduces the difficulty of checks made to conceal this weapon by 1. Reduces range by one range band to a minimum of short. If already short, add • to attack checks. Modification Options: 1 Innate Talent (Quick Draw) Mod. Hard Points Required: 1 Price: 250 credits.

Sources.Source: Edge of the Empire Core Rulebook

Mod.MiscDesc: Reduces the difficulty of checks made to conceal this weapon by 1.

ItemAttachment.Name: Under-Barrel Grenade Launcher
ItemAttachment.Description: [H3]Under-Barrel Grenade Launcher[h3] Under-barrel grenade launchers are designed to give single soldiers or squads heavy anti-infantry or light anti-vehicle capabilities in a small package. This attachment consists of a basic, smooth-bore barrel attached to a magazine with an automatic feed system. It carries up to six grenades and is fired by a simple press of a button. It adds extra weight to the weapon it's mounted to, however, which makes the entire assembly quite barrel-heavy. This attachment can only be applied to rifle-sized Ranged (Heavy) weapons. Models Include: Czerka "Thumper" Under-Barrel Grenade Launcher, SoroSuub XA203 Auxiliary Grenade Launcher, Zone Control "Viper" Under-Barrel Grenade Launcher. Base Modifiers: Enables weapon to fire grenades. This uses the grenade's profile, but uses the Ranged (Heavy) skill to fire and has medium range. Adds Cumbersome (+1) to weapon, and increases encumbrance by 2. Remember, grenades are Limited Ammo 1 weapons, and the launcher is thus Limited Ammo 1. Modification Options: 5 Quality (Limited Ammo + 1) Mods. Hard Points Required: 2 Price: (R) 2,000 credits.

Sources.Source: Edge of the Empire Core Rulebook

Mod.MiscDesc: Weapon can fire grenades using the grenade profile, Ranged (Heavy) skill, and has Medium range.

ItemAttachment.Name: Under-Barrel Flame Projector
ItemAttachment.Description: [H3]Under-Barrel Flame Projector[h3] Uncommon but highly effective, under-barrel flame projectors are designed to give infantry an extra punch at close range. Illegal on many worlds, and classified as a terror weapon, these flame projectors are typically used by only the most desperate or callous individuals. Essentially a scaled-down agricultural flame projector, this attachment fires a cone of searing flame and is quite effective at flushing enemies from cover and destroying flammable materials. This attachment can only be applied to rifle-sized weapons. Models Include: Czerka "Firestorm" Under-Barrel Flame Projector, Merr-Sonn XR14 Sunsear Flame Projector, SoroSuub "Inferno" Auxiliary Flamer. Base Modifiers: Enables weapon to fire using the following profile at the user's choice: (Ranged (Heavy); Dam 10; Crit 2; Range [Short]; Burn 5, Blast 2). Adds Cumbersome (+ 1) to weapon. Modification Options: None. Hard Points Required: 2 Price: (R) 3,000 credits.

Sources.Source: Edge of the Empire Core Rulebook

Mod.MiscDesc: Adds a flame projector to the weapon.

ItemAttachment.Name: Telescopic Optical Sight
ItemAttachment.Description: [H3]Telescopic Optical Sight[h3] Popular with marksmen and snipers, this attachment consists of a long tube attached to the top of a weapon containing a number of very precisely ground lens elements protected by an impact-resistant housing. The lenses are polarized and treated with a glare-resistant coating which makes for a bright, clear view through the scope. It is equipped with necessary adjustments for position and range, and can even be upgraded with an ambient light amplification system. This attachment can be used on any ranged weapon that could logically benefit from the addition of a sight. Models Include: Zikon Optics Model 40 Marksman Scope, Merr-Sonn 80Z Telescopic Optical Sight. Base Modifiers: Reduces the difficulty of ranged combat checks at long and extreme range by one. Modification Options: None. Hard Points Required: 1 Price: 250 Credits.

Sources.Source: Edge of the Empire Core Rulebook

ItemAttachment.Name: Tripod Mount
ItemAttachment.Description: [H3]Tripod Mount[h3] Designed for use with the heaviest portable weapons, tripods are a common sight among heavy weapon squads. Used in static weapon emplacements to support heavy squad support weapons such as the Imperial Army's E-Web heavy repeating blaster, tripods use a number of different technologies, from self-extending hydraulics to tiny, low-output repulsorlift generators to stabilize heavy weapons for firing. This attachment is only for use with Ranged (Heavy) and Gunnery weapons and requires two preparation maneuvers to set up. Models Include: BlasTech 3R Heavy Weapon Tripod. Base Modifiers: Decreases weapon's Cumbersome rating by 3 when set up. May not move the weapon (except to pivot) once tripod is set up. Modification Options: 2 Weapon Quality (Cumbersome -1) Mods. Hard Points Required: 2 Price: 250 credits.

Sources.Source: Edge of the Empire Core Rulebook

ItemAttachment.Name: Weapon Sling
ItemAttachment.Description: [H3]Weapon Sling[h3] Slings are lengths of hide or synthetic fabric designed to allow easy handling of long arms like blaster rifles and slugthrower rifles. They come in a dizzying array of styles, from the simple adjustable single-strap sling for carrying a weapon on the shoulder to multi-strap slings made of specialized materials that allow for any number of custom sling configurations. These attachments can only be used with Ranged (Heavy) weapons. Models Include: Custom-Tooled Bantha Hide Sling, Tactical Three-Point Sling, Quick-Release One-Point Drop Sling. Base Modifiers: Decreases Cumbersome rating by 1. Modification Options: 1 Innate Talent (Quick Draw) Mod. Hard Points Required: 1. Price: 100 credits.

Sources.Source: Edge of the Empire Core Rulebook

ItemAttachment.Name: Weapon Harness
ItemAttachment.Description: [H3]Weapon Harness[h3] Designed to allow a single sentient to held even the heaviest portable weapon with no support, weapon harnesses are common among heavy weapon squads. Worn over the shoulders and belted around the midsection or torso, weapon harnesses consist of a series of load-bearing straps and harnesses connected to a gyro-stabilized, power-assisted boom arm to which a heavy weapon can be affixed. Powered by a tiny rechargeable power pack, the harness offers its user enhanced stability and strength when using heavy weapons. This Attachment can only be used with Ranged (Heavy) and Gunnery weapons. Models Include: Arakyd WW480 "Goliath" Weapons Harness, Galactic Arms HR12 Power Harness, SoroSuub "Little Giant" Heavy Weapon Power Assist. Base Modifiers: Decreases Cumbersome rating by 2. Modification Options: I Innate Talent (Brace) Mod. Hard Points Required: 2. Price: 500 credits.

Sources.Source: Edge of the Empire Core Rulebook

ItemAttachment.Name: Weighted Head
ItemAttachment.Description: [H3]Weighted Head[h3] Bludgeoning weapons such as truncheons, clubs, and hammers do their damage through weight and impact rather than sharp edges or piercing spikes. This modification increases the weight and strength of the striking surface, allowing the weapon to deal more damage more quickly. This is accomplished by using heavier, denser materials in the weapon's construction, reinforcement of key components, or the addition of studs, ridges, or spikes to the business end. Reinforced knuckles can also be added to some weapons for a similar effect. This attachment may only be used on bludgeoning Brawl and Melee weapons. Models Include: None. Base Modifiers: Damage + 1. Modification Options: 1 Damage + 1 Mod, 1 Weapon Quality (Concussive + 1) Mod. Hard Points Required: 2 Price: 250 credits.

Sources.Source: Edge of the Empire Core Rulebook

ItemAttachment.Name: SmartTranq
ItemAttachment.Description: [H3]SmartTranq[h3] Please see page 40 of the Enter the Unknown Sourcebook for details.

Mod.MiscDesc: Upon hit, target must make [B]Average ([DIFFICULTY][DIFFICULTY]) Resilience check[b]. If fail, target takes 5 strain, plus 2 strain per [THREAT]. GM may use [DESPAIR] to make target check again next round at increased difficulty.

ItemAttachment.Name: Gene Lock
ItemAttachment.Description: [H3]Gene Lock[h3] Please see page 51 of the Dangerous Covenants Sourcebook for details.

Mod.MiscDesc: Weapon functions only in the hands of its authorized user.
Self-Destruct. Inflicts one critical hit if unauthorized user tries to use locked weapon. Weapon is destroyed.

ItemAttachment.Name: "Bantha's Eye" Laser Sight
ItemAttachment.Description: [H3]"Bantha's Eye" Laser Sight[h3] Please see page 52 of the Dangerous Covenants Sourcebook for details.

ItemAttachment.Name: H9 Pistol Grip
ItemAttachment.Description: [H3]H9 Pistol Grip[h3] Please see page 52 of the Dangerous Covenants Sourcebook for details.

Mod.MiscDesc: Add [SETBACK] to any combat check made when firing one-handed.

ItemAttachment.Name: "Final Word" Secondary Missile System
ItemAttachment.Description: [H3]"Final Word" Secondary Missile System[h3] Please see page 52 of the Dangerous Covenants Sourcebook for details.

Mod.MiscDesc: Enables weapon to fire rockets, using missile's profile.

ItemAttachment.Name: Model 2 Wrist Mount
ItemAttachment.Description: [H3]Model 2 Wrist Mount[h3] Please see page 52 of the Dangerous Covenants Sourcebook for details.

Mod.MiscDesc: Weapon can be worn on the wrist, freeing user's hands.

ItemAttachment.Name: Blaster Energy Dampener
ItemAttachment.Description: [H3]Blaster Energy Dampener[h3] Please see page 194 of the Force and Destiny Core Rulebook for details.

Mod.MiscDesc: Increases the difficulty of checks made to detect this weapon's fire by one
Add [SE] to checks made to detect this weapon's fire

ItemAttachment.Name: Night Vision Scope
ItemAttachment.Description: [H3]Night Vision Scope[h3] Please see page 194 of the Force and Destiny Core Rulebook for details.

Mod.MiscDesc: Remove up to [SETBACK][SETBACK] on any checks to use this weapon due to darkness

ItemAttachment.Name: Shadowsheath
ItemAttachment.Description: [H3]Shadowsheath[h3] Please see page 194 of the Force and Destiny Core Rulebook for details.

Mod.MiscDesc: Increases the difficulty of any checks made to detect the sheath or the weapon it holds by two

ItemAttachment.Name: Stun Pulse
ItemAttachment.Description: [H3]Stun Pulse[h3] Please see page 194 of the Force and Destiny Core Rulebook for details.

ItemAttachment.Name: Weapon Signature Reduction
ItemAttachment.Description: [H3]Weapon Signature Reduction[h3] Please see page 110 of the Strongholds of Resistance Sourcebook for details.

Mod.MiscDesc: Increase the difficulty checks using scanners to search for this weapon by 2. Add [SE] to all Mechanics checks to perform maintenance on this weapon.

ItemAttachment.Name: Electronic Sighting System
ItemAttachment.Description: [H3]Electronic Sighting System[h3] Please see page 110 of the Strongholds of Resistance Sourcebook for details.

Mod.MiscDesc: Allows shooter to aim as an incidental once per round at short range. Decreases the difficulty of Perception checks to locate the shooter in low light conditions by 1.

ItemAttachment.Name: Environmental Adaption Kit
ItemAttachment.Description: [H3]Environmental Adaption Kit[h3] Please see page 50 of the Savage Spirits Sourcebook for details.[P] [I]Note: If this kit is for a specific environment, rename the kit to specify the environment.[i]

Mod.MiscDesc: Prevents a weapon from breaking down as a result of a specific type of environment.

ItemAttachment.Name: Hunting Barrel
ItemAttachment.Description: [H3]Hunting Barrel[h3] Please see page 50 of the Savage Spirits Sourcebook for details.

ItemAttachment.Name: Motion Tracker
ItemAttachment.Description: [H3]Motion Tracker[h3] Please see page 50 of the Savage Spirits Sourcebook for details.

Mod.MiscDesc: Remove [SE] due to target movement or use of Guarded Stance.

ItemAttachment.Name: Slugthrower Suppressor
ItemAttachment.Description: [H3]Slugthrower Suppressor[h3] Please see page 51 of the Savage Spirits Sourcebook for details.

Mod.MiscDesc: Adds [SE][SE] to Perception or Vigilance checks made to locate a concealed shooter firing a silenced slugthrower.

ItemAttachment.Name: Gimmellian Stealth Device
ItemAttachment.Description: [H3]Gimmellian Stealth Device[h3] Please see page 118 of the Strongholds of Resistance Sourcebook for details. [P][I]This is an optional no-cost attachment for the Tallanx-Class Stealth Fighter and the Darvro-Class Light Freighter.[i]

Mod.MiscDesc: Reduces range band of enemy ships' passive sensors by 1 (to a minimum of close range) for detecting the Tallanx.
All power for shields and weapons must be rerouted to device for it to work. Rerouting takes one action.

ItemAttachment.Name: Electronic Countermeasures Suite (Custom)
ItemAttachment.Description: [H3]Electronic Countermeasures Suite (Custom)[h3] Please see page 118 of the Strongholds of Resistance Sourcebook for details. [P][I]This is an optional no-cost attachment for the Tallanx-Class Stealth Fighter and the Darvro-Class Light Freighter.[i]

Mod.MiscDesc: Blocks sensors within range, counting the ship's silhouette as one smaller when being fired upon.
Immediately notifies all ships in a star system or within 100 kilometers if planetside to the ship or vehicle's existence.

ItemAttachment.Name: Mk. IV Modular Backpack Accessory Pouch
ItemAttachment.Description: [H3]Mk. IV Modular Backpack Accessory Pouch[h3] Please see page 51 of the Enter the Unknown Sourcebook for details.

ItemAttachment.Name: Mk. III Modular Backpack Accessory Pouch
ItemAttachment.Description: [H3]Mk. III Modular Backpack Accessory Pouch[h3] Please see page 46 of the Savage Spirits Sourcebook for details.

ItemAttachment.Name: Cortosis Weave
ItemAttachment.Description: [H3]Cortosis Weave[h3] Although uncommon, and considered by most to be useless and archaic, some armorers can modify a suit with a special energy-resistant mesh of rare cortosis ore. This makes the armor more resistant to penetration by energy weapons, but the result is rarely worth the price. Models Include: Various types. Base Modifiers: The armor gains the Cortosis quality. Modification Options: None. Hard Points Required: 2. Price: 10,000 credits.

Sources.Source: Edge of the Empire Core Rulebook

ItemAttachment.Name: Thermal Shielding System
ItemAttachment.Description: [H3]Thermal Shielding System[h3] Using both active and passive cooling systems, along with an insulated bodyglove and special coatings on the armor plates, this attachment allows a wearer to withstand dangerously high temperatures. This thermal shielding protects against open flames, molten rock and steel, intense heat, and even some forms of radiation. Unfortunately, the cooling systems are easily disrupted and can fail if the suit is exposed to undue abuse. This attachment can be installed on any medium or heavy armor that covers the entire body and can be sealed. Models Include: Atlas Corp Model 451 Heat Exchanger, Kaminoan Armorsmiths "Salamander" Thermal Shielding System, Min-Dal 3100 Firebrand Suit. Base Modifiers: Reduces the difficulty of Resilience checks made to resist the effects of fire and extreme heat by one. Removes up to [SE] [SE] added to checks due to extreme heat or fire. Modification Options: None. Hard Points Required: Price: 1,000 credits.

Sources.Source: Edge of the Empire Core Rulebook

Mod.MiscDesc: Reduces the difficulty of Resilience checks made to resist the effects of fire and extreme heat by one. Removes up to [SETBACK][SETBACK] added to checks due to extreme heat or fire.

ItemAttachment.Name: Heating System
ItemAttachment.Description: [H3]Heating System[h3] Like thermal shielding, cold shielding is installed in armor to protect the wearer against dangerously low temperatures and frigid environments. Equipped with small, efficient heating elements and double-insulated against the cold, this attachment allows a wearer to survive in places where the ambient temperature can be dozens of degrees below freezing. Perhaps the most famous type of cold shielding is that built into the custom laminate armor worn by Imperial snowtroopers, specialists trained to operate in hazardous arctic conditions. This attachment can be installed on any armor that covers the entire body and can be sealed. Models Include: Atlas Corp DL87 "Frostback" Armor Enhancement, Min-Dal Model 00 Heating System. Base Modifiers: Reduces the difficulty of Resilience checks made to resist the effects of extreme cold by one. Removes up to [SE] [SE] added to checks due to extreme cold. Modification Options: None. Hard Points Required: 1. Price: 1,000 credits.

Sources.Source: Edge of the Empire Core Rulebook

Mod.MiscDesc: Reduces the difficulty of Resilience checks made to resist the effects extreme cold by one. Removes up to [SETBACK][SETBACK] added to checks due to extreme cold.

ItemAttachment.Name: Enhanced Optics Suite
ItemAttachment.Description: [H3]Enhanced Optics Suite[h3] Built into a helmet, this system provides an individual with a host of specialized optical and audio sensors. Each system is equipped with passive light amplification, thermal signature readers, ultrasound pickups, millimeter wave emitters, video capture, and common optical enhancements. All of these sophisticated sensors increase the wearer's battlespace awareness and allow him to see items and other sentients in inclement conditions such as smoke, fog, and darkness. Models Include: BioTech MULTI Enhanced Vision System, Atlas Corp Full-Spectrum Optical Enhancer, Neuro-Saav Anq-Y Enhanced Optics Suite. Base Modifiers: Removes up to [SE] [SE] added to Perception, Vigilance, and combat skill checks due to darkness, smoke, or other environmental effects that obscure vision. Modification Options: 1 Skill (Vigilance) Mod. Hard Points Required: 1. Price: 1,750 credits.

Sources.Source: Edge of the Empire Core Rulebook

Mod.MiscDesc: Removes up to [SETBACK][SETBACK] added to all Perception, Vigilance, and combat skill checks due to darkness, smoke, or other environmental effects that obscure vision.

ItemAttachment.Name: Strength Enhancing System
ItemAttachment.Description: [H3]Strength Enhancing System[h3] Strength-enhancing systems easily convert a suit of full armor into a power-assisted suit. Composed of a matrix of electrically-controlled myomer synthetic muscle fibers backed up with nano-hydraulics, an SES increases a wearer's raw physical strength, allowing him to lift more and carry more for longer periods of time. This attachment can only be used with laminate armor or similar full-body hard armor suits. Models Include: Atlas Corp Myomer Strength Enhancing System, Industrial Automaton Xr5 Power Assist, BioTech "Brute" Strength Enhancer. Base Modifiers: Increases wearer's Brawn by one point while wearing this armor. This does not increase soak or wound threshold. Modification Options: 2 Skill (Athletics) Mods, 2 Innate Talent (Brace) Mods. Hard Points Required: 2 Price: 5,500 credits.

Sources.Source: Edge of the Empire Core Rulebook

ItemAttachment.Name: Optical Camouflage System
ItemAttachment.Description: [H3]Optical Camouflage System[h3] Popular with both military scouts and assassins, optical camouflage systems are a wonder of modern stealth technology. Using a series of phased array optical projectors combined with sound baffling equipment and thermal and radiation shielding, these attachments can render a wearer nearly invisible to the naked eye. The PAO projectors allow the wearer to blend in with his surroundings by mimicking them (similar to an animal with active camouflage abilities). The different radiation shields hide the wearer's body heat as well as any electromagnetic radiation from other sensors or communications gear. For all of its utility, however, this system is incredibly fragile and is not recommended for combat. This attachment can be equipped on any type of armor, but it is nearly useless on laminate and plastoid heavy armor, which is often too bulky and loud to mask properly. Models Include: BioTech "Flicker" Displacement Field, Atlas Corp "Smokescreen" Stealth System, Merr-Sonn "Ghost" Optical Camouflage System. Base Modifiers: Upgrades the ability of all Stealth checks twice while wearing this armor. Modification Options: Innate Talent (Master of Shadows) Mod, 1 Skill (Stealth) Mod. Hard Points Required: 2. Price: 5,500 credits.

Sources.Source: Edge of the Empire Core Rulebook

Mod.MiscDesc: Upgrades the ability of all Stealth checks twice while wearing this armor.

ItemAttachment.Name: Superior Armor Customization
ItemAttachment.Description: [H3]Superior Armor Customization[h3] Any piece of armor can benefit from refitting at the hands of a skilled craftsman. A skilled armorsmith can add improved plastoid or durasteel plates, resize, reduce weight, and custom fit a suit to a wearer so that it fits him like a second skin. Of course, serious alterations such as these can make armor less customizable in other respects. Models Include: None. Base Modifiers: Gives the armor the Superior quality. Modification Options: None. Hard Points Required: 1 Price: 5,000 credits.

Sources.Source: Edge of the Empire Core Rulebook

ItemAttachment.Name: Vacuum Sealed
ItemAttachment.Description: [H3]Vacuum Sealed[h3] Full-body hard armor can be modified to seal against vacuum, turning the suit into a makeshift spacesuit for a limited time. This modification provides the armor with enough air and insulation to survive in vacuum for up to ten minutes and protects the wearer from toxic or otherwise hazardous environments. This modification can only be applied to laminate and battle armor. Models Include: Numerous variants. Base Modifiers: Allows the user to ignore the effects of vacuum or poisonous atmospheric environments for up to 10 minutes. Modification Options: None. Hard Points Required: Price: 1,000 credits.

Sources.Source: Edge of the Empire Core Rulebook

Mod.MiscDesc: Allows the user to ignore the effects of vacuum or poisonous atmospheric environments for up to 10 minutes.

Mod.MiscDesc: Adds a general purpose scanner to the user’s helmet. The scanner allows the user to remove [SETBACK] imposed on any checks due to darkness or environmental conditions such as smoke or fog. It also allows the user to detect heat sources and motion within medium range.

ItemAttachment.Name: Advanced Targeting Array
ItemAttachment.Description: [H3]Advanced Targeting Array[h3] Advanced targeting arrays use sophisticated holoimaging to present a pilot or gunner a detailed, threedimensional view of his target. Installation of an ATA increases the accuracy of a ship's weapons, and allows gunners to get more shots on target, increasing their effectiveness in combat. Models Include: Taim & Bak LR-375a Sureshot Advanced Targeting Array, Fabritech KR-770 "Sharpshooter" Targeting Computer, Koensayr Manufacturing 840.z Holo-Targeting Suite. Base Modifiers: Upgrades the ability of Gunnery checks when firing mounted weapons by 1. Modification Options: 1 Additional upgrade Mod, 1 Innate Talent (Sniper Shot) Mod, 1 Innate Talent (True Aim) Mod. Hard Points Required: 1. Price: 4,000 credits.

Sources.Source: Edge of the Empire Core Rulebook

ItemAttachment.Name: Enhanced Carbon-Durasteel Armor
ItemAttachment.Description: [H3]Enhanced Carbon-Durasteel Armor[h3] Produced by numerous starship manufacturers, these armor plates are made from a complex lattice of carbon nanotubes embedded with spun threads of durasteel. This modification may be applied to all starships and vehicles. Models Include: Ferro-Magnesium Armor Plate, Cerro-Ablative Sheets. Base Modifiers: Adds 1 point to starship armor and reduces starship handling by 1. Modification Options: None. Hard Points Required: 2. Price: 2,000 credits per point of starship or vehicle silhouette.

Sources.Source: Edge of the Empire Core Rulebook

ItemAttachment.Name: Electronic Countermeasures Suite
ItemAttachment.Description: [H3]Electronic Countermeasures Suite[h3] Designed to blind and deafen enemy ships, an electronic countermeasures suite transmits a dense stream of white noise and junk data that fogs sensors and jams comms traffic within close range of the broadcasting ship. This may be applied to all starships and vehicles. Models Include: Fabritech 995 Stormcloud ECM Suite, Miradyne 4x-Phantom Short-Range Sensor Jammer (starfighters only), KDY 220-SIG Tactical Combat Jammer (capital ships only). Base Modifiers: Blocks all sensors within range, counting the ship or vehicle's silhouette as 1 smaller when attacked. Immediately notifies all ships in a star system, or within 100 kilometers if planetside, of the ship or vehicle's existence. Modification Options: 1 Increase difficulty by 1 when making subsequent attacks with the Guided quality Mod. Hard Points Required: 1. Price: 3,000 credits.

Sources.Source: Edge of the Empire Core Rulebook

Mod.MiscDesc: Blocks sensors within range, counting the ship's silhouette as one smaller when being fired upon.
Immediately notifies all ships in a star system or within 100 kilometers if planetside to the ship or vehicle's existence.
Increase difficulty by one with Guided quality

ItemAttachment.Name: Hydraulic Control Circuits
ItemAttachment.Description: [H3]Hydraulic Control Circuits[h3] Common on ships used by the Rebel Alliance, hydraulic control circuits are a throwback to an earlier era of shipbuilding. Instead of using traditional conductive material pressed into composite wafer boards to transfer electromagnetic energy, HCCs use countless, nearmicroscopic transparisteel tubes full of highly conductive liquid metal similar in its composition to mercury. Held under pressure and regulated by a series of valves, this metal controls the flow of energy. This can be added to non-fighter starships. Models Include: Corellian Engineering Corporation Hydraulic Control Circuits, Santhe/Sienar Hardened Circuitry, Fabritech Insulated Circuitry. Base Modifiers: Ships equipped with these attachments suffer half damage from weapons possessing the Ion quality after damage is reduced by armor. When installed, reduce handling and system strain threshold by 1. Modification Options: 1 Defender chooses ship component affected by Ion weapon quality, as opposed to the attacker Mod. 1 Increase system strain threshold by 1 Mod. Hard Points Required: 2. Price: 1,000 credits.

Sources.Source: Edge of the Empire Core Rulebook

Mod.MiscDesc: Half damage from weapons with Ion quality
Defender chooses ship component affected

ItemAttachment.Name: Reinforced Shield Generator
ItemAttachment.Description: [H3]Reinforced Shield Generator[h3] A good defense is crucial to keeping Rebel starships fighting the good fight. Hardened shields upgrade a ship's stock particle and ray shielding to make them stronger and to make the shields easier to manage. Models Include: KDY 880 Palisade Shield Generator, Phoah-Kingsmeyer 721 a AEGIS Shield Generators, Sienar SH-2/a.Z Shield Reinforcement. Base Modifiers: 1 additional point of defense to one defense zone of choice. Modification Options: 2 One additional point of defense to one defense zone of choice Mods. Hard Points Required: 2. Price: 3,800 credits.

Sources.Source: Edge of the Empire Core Rulebook

ItemAttachment.Name: Smuggling Compartments
ItemAttachment.Description: [H3]Smuggling Compartments[h3] Please see page 270 of the Edge of the Empire Core Rulebook, or page 271 of the Force and Destiny Core Rulebook, for details.

Sources.Source: Edge of the Empire Core Rulebook

ItemAttachment.Name: Retrofitted Hangar Bay
ItemAttachment.Description: [H3]Retrofitted Hangar Bay[h3] Some starships or large vehicles can be modified to carry smaller vehicles (with a maximum silhouette of 2 smaller than the carrier) in a converted cargo hold or other compartment. The hangar bay modification includes launch and recovery systems as well as fueling, traffic control, and maintenance facilities. This may only be used on ships or vehicles with a silhouette of 5 or more. Models Include: None. Base Modifiers: Allows a ship or vehicle to carry smaller vehicles (with a maximum silhouette of 2 smaller than the carrier) in a converted cargo hold or other compartment. Silhouette 5 vehicles can carry a total silhouette of 5, silhouette 6 vehicles can carry a total silhouette of 20, and silhouette 7 + vehicles can carry a total silhouette of 60. The total silhouette is calculated by adding together all carried vehicles' silhouettes. For instance, a silhouette 5 vehicle could carry 2 silhouette 2 vehicles (speeder bikes, for example) in its retrofitted cargo bay, whereas a silhouette 6 vehicle could carry 10 speeder bikes. Common sense and GM judgment apply when determining what vehicles can and cannot fit in a hangar bay. Modification Options: 5 Additional + 1 maximum silhouette capacity Mods. Hard Points Required: 2, Price: 5,000 credits per point of starship or vehicle silhouette.

Sources.Source: Edge of the Empire Core Rulebook

ItemAttachment.Name: Hyperdrive Generator
ItemAttachment.Description: [H3]Hyperdrive Generator[h3] Upgraded hyperdrive generators increase a vessel's speed through hyperspace, allowing it to complete journeys in a fraction of the time. Models Include: Isu-Sim SSP05 Hyperdrive Generator, SFS S/ig-30 Hyperdrive System, KDY JumpStar Hyperdrive Generator. Base Modifiers: Reduces a ship's hyperdrive class by 1 to a minimum of 1. Modification Options: 2 Reduce hyperspace rating by 1 to a minimum of .5 Mods. Hard Points Required: Price: 6,400 credits.

Sources.Source: Edge of the Empire Core Rulebook

ItemAttachment.Name: High-Output Ion Turbine
ItemAttachment.Description: [H3]High-Output Ion Turbine[h3] Upgraded engines increase a ship or vehicle's raw, straight-line speed at the cost of lower reliability. This modification may be added to any ship or vehicle. Models Include: Girodyne Ter40 High-Output Ion Turbine, Sienar Fleet Systems SFS-220 Ion Drives, Koensayr Manufacturing R800 Ion Ramjet. Base Modifiers: Adds 1 point to a ship's speed and reduces system strain threshold by 1. Modification Options: None. Hardpoints Required: 1 Price: 5,300 credits.

Sources.Source: Edge of the Empire Core Rulebook

ItemAttachment.Name: Upgraded Comms Array
ItemAttachment.Description: [H3]Upgraded Comms Array[h3] Upgraded comm systems are powerful subspace comms arrays that can be fitted to most ships in the galaxy. Models Include: Chedak Communications Frequency Agile Subspace Transceiver (FAST), SFS Ranger Long Range Transceiver, Fabritech 44Q/r Multi-Band Transceiver. Base Modifiers: Increases the range of shipboard communications by 1 range band. Modification Options: 2 One additional range band Mods. Hard Points Required: 1. Price: 4,800 credits.

ItemAttachment.Description: [H3]Swoop Speed Modification[h3] Boosts the engines of a swoop and also removes excess weight from the chassis.

Increase Droid Brain's Astrogation Skill by 1

ItemAttachment.Description: [H3]Autopilot Droid Brain[h3] Please see page 62 of the Fly Casual Sourcebook for details.

Mod.MiscDesc: Adds a Droid Brain with Piloting Skills 2 and Intellect 0
May summon vehicle via a beckon call.
Increase Droid Brain's Piloting Skills by 1

ItemAttachment.Description: [H3]AX-108 "Ground Buzzer" Surface-Defense Blaster Cannon[h3] Please see page 62 of the Fly Casual Sourcebook for details.

Mod.MiscDesc: Adds one AX-108 Surface Defense Blaster Cannon weapon
Can fire automatically with a Ranged (Heavy) skill of 2 and an Agility of 0
Increase the weapon's automated Ranged (Heavy) skill by one

ItemAttachment.Name: Cloaked Smuggling Compartments
ItemAttachment.Description: [H3]Cloaked Smuggling Compartments[h3] Please see page 63 of the Fly Casual Sourcebook, for details.

Mod.MiscDesc: Increases difficulty of checks made to find compartment by 3.

ItemAttachment.Name: Set Trigger
ItemAttachment.Description: [H3]Set Trigger[h3] Please see page 51 of the Fly Casual Sourcebook for details.

Mod.MiscDesc: Automatic [SU][TH] to the first combat check made with this weapon each encounter.
Adds [SU] to the first combat check made with this weapon each encounter

ItemAttachment.Description: [H3]Overcharge Valve[h3] Please see page 51 of the Fly Casual Sourcebook for details.

Mod.MiscDesc: As incidental, weapon gains Prepare 1 quality and +4 damage for next attack. After firing, weapon runs out of ammo.

ItemAttachment.Name: Paired Weapons
ItemAttachment.Description: [H3]Paired Weapons[h3] Please see page 51 of the Fly Casual Sourcebook for details.

Mod.MiscDesc: Reduce [AD] required to hit with second weapon when two-weapon fighting by 1.

ItemAttachment.Name: Underslung Scattergun
ItemAttachment.Description: [H3]Underslung Scattergun[h3] Please see page 51 of the Fly Casual Sourcebook for details.

Mod.MiscDesc: Adds a scattergun to the weapon.

ItemAttachment.Description: [H3]Starhawk Sidecar[h3] Please see page 53 of the Fly Casual Sourcebook for details.

ItemAttachment.Description: [H3]Interior Broadcast Suite[h3] Please see page 63 of the Fly Casual Sourcebook for details.

Mod.MiscDesc: Increases the strain threshold of each crewmember by 1

ItemAttachment.Description: [H3]Nightshadow Coating[h3] Please see page 63 of the Fly Casual Sourcebook for details.

Mod.MiscDesc: Reduces range of enemy ship's passive sensors by 1 (minimum of close range) for detecting a vessel with nightshadow coating.
Reduce the ship's silhouette by 1 in combat

ItemAttachment.Name: Onboard Amenities Unit
ItemAttachment.Description: [H3]Onboard Amenities Unit[h3] Please see page 63 of the Fly Casual Sourcebook for details.

Mod.MiscDesc: Upgrades ability of Charm, Deception, and Negotiation checks while aboard once.

ItemAttachment.Name: Rapid Cargo Evacuation Chute
ItemAttachment.Description: [H3]Rapid Cargo Evacuation Chute[h3] Please see page 63 of the Fly Casual Sourcebook for details.

Mod.MiscDesc: Make an [B]Average ([DI][DI]) Mechanics check[b] as an action while in the cockpit or cargo bay to eject everything currently stored in the cargo hold.
May instead be activated as an action without making a check Mod.

ItemAttachment.Name: Whisperthrust Engine
ItemAttachment.Description: [H3]Whisperthrust Engine[h3] Please see page 63 of the Fly Casual Sourcebook for details.

Mod.MiscDesc: Increases the difficulty of checks to detect this vessel by two while it is traveling at speed 3 or lower.

ItemAttachment.Name: Advanced Subspace Encryption Array
ItemAttachment.Description: [H3]Advanced Subspace Encryption Array[h3] Please see page 65 of the Desperate Allies Sourcebook for details.

Mod.MiscDesc: Only the intended recipient can detect a transmission sent with this attachment without a [B]Hard ([DI][DI][DI]) Computers check[b].
Upgrade the difficulty of any checks to intercept or decipher transmissions made from this attachment once.
Add [SE] to enemy detection check
Add [SE] to enemy interception or deciphering check

ItemAttachment.Name: Luxury Passenger Compartments
ItemAttachment.Description: [H3]Luxury Passenger Compartments[h3] Please see page 65 of the Desperate Allies Sourcebook for details.

Mod.MiscDesc: Add [BO] to all Charm, Deception, and Negotiation checks made against passengers within the vehicle. Checks made against passengers who are accustomed to opulence and luxury have up to [SE][SE] removed instead.

ItemAttachment.Name: Holonet Pirate Array
ItemAttachment.Description: [H3]Holonet Pirate Array[h3] Please see page 65 of the Desperate Allies Sourcebook for details.

Mod.MiscDesc: Transmissions sent with this attachment can reach any facility that has access to interstellar communications. Transmissions can be intercepted with a [B]Hard ([DI][DI][DI]) Computers check[b], provided someone is aware of the transmission.
Add [SE] to enemy checks to intercept outgoing transmissions.
Add [BO] to intercept HoloNet traffic

ItemAttachment.Name: Environmental Simulators
ItemAttachment.Description: [H3]Environmental Simulators[h3] Please see page 64 of the Desperate Allies Sourcebook for details.

Mod.MiscDesc: Can replicate up to three different planetary environments, one at a time. When making Charm or Negotiation checks against members of species native to replicated environment, add an automatic [AD][AD] to pool.
Additional planetary environment

ItemAttachment.Name: Engineering Access
ItemAttachment.Description: [H3]Engineering Access[h3] Please see page 61 of the Enter the Unknown Sourcebook for details.

Mod.MiscDesc: Anyone working on internal systems, such as power systems, hyperdrive, computers, sensors, gain [BOOST] to Mechanics and Computer checks due to the ease of reaching such typically hidden systems.

ItemAttachment.Name: ANQ 3.6 Tracking Computer
ItemAttachment.Description: [H3]ANQ 3.6 Tracking Computer[h3] Please see page 60 of the Enter the Unknown Sourcebook for details.

Mod.MiscDesc: Choose one target and make [B]Average ([DI][DI]) Computers check[b]. If successful, combat checks against target are upgraded once. [SU][SU][SU] or [TR] allows additional target.

ItemAttachment.Name: Engine Ring Stabilizer
ItemAttachment.Description: [H3]Engine Ring Stabilizer[h3] Please see page 82 of the [B]Mask of the Pirate Queen[b] adventure module for details.

ItemAttachment.Name: Space Slug Abilities
ItemAttachment.Description: [H3]Space Slug Abilities[h3]

Mod.MiscDesc: When rolling for initiative, or attacking with its Insatiable Maw, a space slug rolls a [B]Coordination skill check[b], counting as having Coordination 3 and Agility 1 ([PR][AB][AB]).

A starship of silhouette 5 or lower attacked by a space slug, regardless of whether or not the attack hit, must make a [B]Hard ([DI][DI][DI]) Piloting (Space) check[b] to avoid being swallowed. If swallowed, ship suffers 10 hull trauma daily from being digested.
The stomach of an space slug is also generally home to mynocks, which will waste no time attacking a swallowed starship.

ItemAttachment.Name: Briefing Auditorium
ItemAttachment.Description: [H3]Briefing Auditorium[h3] Please see page 58 of the Lead by Example Sourcebook for details.

Mod.MiscDesc: Characters briefed in this auditorium prior to a mission remove [SE] due to known mission conditions from skill checks for the duration of the mission.
Add [AD] to Leadership checks made by characters within the briefing auditorium

ItemAttachment.Name: Electronic Counter-Countermeasures Suite
ItemAttachment.Description: [H3]Electronic Counter-Countermeasures Suite[h3] Please see page 59 of the Lead by Example Sourcebook for details.

Mod.MiscDesc: Make a [B]Hard ([DI][DI][DI]) Computers check[b] to cancel all effects of an electronic countermeasures suite.
Decrease difficulty of the Computers check by 1

ItemAttachment.Name: Holo-Tank
ItemAttachment.Description: [H3]Holo-Tank[h3] Please see page 59 of the Lead by Example Sourcebook for details.

Mod.MiscDesc: Characters utilizing a holo-tank may always use Cool or Knowledge (Warfare) when making Initiative checks.
Add [AD] to Mass Combat checks when acting force commander is on board this ship
Upgrade the ability of checks when determining Initiative once

ItemAttachment.Name: Tactical Command, Control, and Communications Suite
ItemAttachment.Description: [H3]Tactical Command, Control, and Communications Suite[h3] Please see page 59 of the Lead by Example Sourcebook for details.

Mod.MiscDesc: While active, a force commander in the vehicle upgrades the ability of all Mass Combat checks once
Allies benefiting from Situational Awareness remove [SE] on Perception and Vigilance checks

ItemAttachment.Name: Theater Command and Control System
ItemAttachment.Description: [H3]Theater Command and Control System[h3] Please see page 59 of the Lead by Example Sourcebook for details.

Mod.MiscDesc: While active, force commander on the bridge upgrades the ability of all Mass Combat checks twice
Gain an additional [AD] on Mass Combat checks
Remove [SE] from Mass Combat checks

ItemAttachment.Description: [H3]Shaped Nozzle[h3] Please see page 45 of the Special Modifications Sourcebook for details.

ItemAttachment.Description: [H3]Pressurized Gas Cartridge[h3] Please see page 45 of the Special Modifications Sourcebook for details.

ItemAttachment.Description: [H3]Top-Loading Magazine[h3] Please see page 46 of the Special Modifications Sourcebook for details.

ItemAttachment.Description: [H3]Balanced Barrel[h3] Please see page 46 of the Special Modifications Sourcebook for details.

ItemAttachment.Description: [H3]Gyrostabilizer[h3] Please see page 54 of the Special Modifications Sourcebook for details.

ItemAttachment.Description: [H3]Integrated Scanner[h3] Please see page 54 of the Special Modifications Sourcebook for details.

Mod.MiscDesc: Weapon incorporates a general-purpose scanner.
Wielder adds automatic [AD][AD] to Initiative checks while weapon is drawn.
Remove [SE] from Initiative checks

ItemAttachment.Name: Optimized Energy Cell
ItemAttachment.Description: [H3]Optimized Energy Cell[h3] Please see page 54 of the Special Modifications Sourcebook for details.

Mod.MiscDesc: When GM spends [DE] or [TH] to cause the weapon to run out of ammo, it requires an additional [TH].

ItemAttachment.Name: Overcharged Actuating Module
ItemAttachment.Description: [H3]Overcharged Actuating Module[h3] Please see page 55 of the Special Modifications Sourcebook for details.

Mod.MiscDesc: GM may spend [TH][TH] to damage weapon by one step.

ItemAttachment.Name: Rapid-Recharge XCiter
ItemAttachment.Description: [H3]Rapid-Recharge XCiter[h3] Please see page 55 of the Special Modifications Sourcebook for details.

ItemAttachment.Name: Secondary Ion Blaster
ItemAttachment.Description: [H3]Secondary Ion Blaster[h3] Please see page 56 of the Special Modifications Sourcebook for details.

Mod.MiscDesc: Adds an ion blaster to the weapon.

ItemAttachment.Name: Sonic Scope
ItemAttachment.Description: [H3]Sonic Scope[h3] Please see page 56 of the Special Modifications Sourcebook for details.

Mod.MiscDesc: May observe and target enemies who are completely hidden by solid objects.

ItemAttachment.Description: [H3]Stripped Down[h3] Please see page 56 of the Special Modifications Sourcebook for details.

Mod.MiscDesc: Add [SE] to Perception checks to find the weapon when hidden.

ItemAttachment.Description: [H3]Vibro-Bayonet[h3] Please see page 56 of the Special Modifications Sourcebook for details.

Mod.MiscDesc: Adds a vibro-bayonet to the weapon

Removes [SE] from physical checks due to underwater conditions.
Increase oxygen supply by two hours

ItemAttachment.Name: Custom Fit
ItemAttachment.Description: [H3]Custom Fit[h3] Please see page 57 of the Special Modifications Sourcebook for details.

Mod.MiscDesc: Removes [SE] from Athletics and Stealth checks.
Remove an additional [SE] from Athletics and Stealth checks

ItemAttachment.Description: [H3]Integrated Ascension Gear[h3] Please see page 57 of the Special Modifications Sourcebook for details.

May pull another character aloft by making an [B]Easy ([DI]) Athletics check[b].

Mod.MiscDesc: Counts as having Slicer Gear. Can be controlled by gesture or voice.

ItemAttachment.Description: [H3]Ion Shielding[h3] Please see page 58 of the Special Modifications Sourcebook for details.

Mod.MiscDesc: Increase soak by 3 against weapons with Ion quality.

ItemAttachment.Name: Radiation Shielding

ItemAttachment.Description: [H3]Cargo Pod for AD-1S[h3] Please see page 62 of the Special Modifications Sourcebook for details.

ItemAttachment.Description: [H3]Fine-Tuned Microthrusters for AD-1S[h3] Please see page 63 of the Special Modifications Sourcebook for details.

ItemAttachment.Name: (AD-1S) Hyperdrive Class 4 Module
ItemAttachment.Description: [H3]Hyperdrive Class 4 Module for AD-1S[h3] Please see page 63 of the Special Modifications Sourcebook for details.

Mod.MiscDesc: Add astromech droid socket.

ItemAttachment.Name: (AD-1S) Sublight Boost Thrusters
ItemAttachment.Description: [H3]Sublight Boost Thrusters for AD-1S[h3] Please see page 63 of the Special Modifications Sourcebook for details.

Remove [SE] from Gunnery checks due to cover or terrain

ItemAttachment.Name: Amphibious Modification
ItemAttachment.Description: [H3]Amphibious Modification[h3] Please see page 65 of the Special Modifications Sourcebook for details.

Mod.MiscDesc: Vehicle can operate underwater without penalty.

ItemAttachment.Name: Decoy Buoy
ItemAttachment.Description: [H3]Decoy Buoy[h3] Please see page 65 of the Special Modifications Sourcebook for details.

Mod.MiscDesc: Buoy may be jettisoned as an action.
Buoy can be programmed with a specific transponder code with a [B]Hard ([DI][DI][DI]) Computers check[b].
Buoy can be set to transmit a distress signal or other data.
A character operating ship sensors must make a [B]Hard ([DI][DI][DI]) Computers check[b] to identify that the buoy is not an actual ship.
After being jettisoned, buoy no longer counts as being attached to the ship until it is reattached.
Add [SE] to Computers checks to identify the buoy

ItemAttachment.Name: Encrypted Computer
ItemAttachment.Description: [H3]Encrypted Computer[h3] Please see page 65 of the Special Modifications Sourcebook for details.

Mod.MiscDesc: Upgrade difficulty of all Computers checks made to slice the ship's computer system once.
Add [SE] to Computers checks made to slice the ship's computer systems

ItemAttachment.Name: Encrypted Computer
ItemAttachment.Description: [H3]Encrypted Computer[h3] Please see page 65 of the Special Modifications Sourcebook for details.

Mod.MiscDesc: Upgrade difficulty of all Computers checks made to slice the ship's computer system once.
Add [SE] to Computers checks made to slice the ship's computer systems

ItemAttachment.Name: Enhanced Hyperspace Shields
ItemAttachment.Description: [H3]Enhanced Hyperspace Shields[h3] Please see page 66 of the Special Modifications Sourcebook for details.

Mod.MiscDesc: Downgrade difficulty of Astrogation checks made to navigate the ship through hyperspace once.
Remove [SE] from Astrogation checks made to navigate the ship through hyperspace

ItemAttachment.Name: Enhanced Repulsorlift
ItemAttachment.Description: [H3]Enhanced Repulsorlift[h3] Please see page 65 of the Special Modifications Sourcebook for details.

ItemAttachment.Name: Gunnery Droid Brain
ItemAttachment.Description: [H3]Gunnery Droid Brain[h3] Please see page 66 of the Special Modifications Sourcebook for details.

Mod.MiscDesc: Add a droid brain with Gunnery 2 and Agility 0.
Increase the droid brain's Gunnery skill by 1

ItemAttachment.Name: Laser Focusing Array
ItemAttachment.Description: [H3]Laser Focusing Array[h3] Please see page 66 of the Special Modifications Sourcebook for details.

Mod.MiscDesc: Add automatic [AD] to combat checks made with the ship's laser cannons and turbolasers.

ItemAttachment.Name: Overcharged Ion Engines
ItemAttachment.Description: [H3]Overcharged Ion Engines[h3] Please see page 66 of the Special Modifications Sourcebook for details.

ItemAttachment.Name: Pseudo-Cloaking Device
ItemAttachment.Description: [H3]Pseudo-Cloaking Device[h3] Please see page 66 of the Special Modifications Sourcebook for details.

Mod.MiscDesc: Increase the difficulty of checks to detect the ship with sensors by two.
Upgrade the difficulty of all combat checks once against the ship at Short range or further.
Add [SE] to combat checks targetting ship at Short range or further

ItemAttachment.Name: Secondary Transponder
ItemAttachment.Description: [H3]Secondary Transponder[h3] Please see page 67 of the Special Modifications Sourcebook for details.

Mod.MiscDesc: Crew can switch to the secondary transponder as an action, making an [B]Average ([DI][DI]) Computers check[b].
An observer who scans the ship can detect discrepancies indicating the presence of a secondary transponder with a [B]Daunting ([DI][DI][DI][DI]) Computers check[b].
Activate secondary transponder as a maneuver
Add one additional ship identity

ItemAttachment.Description: [H3]Security Measures[h3] Please see page 67 of the Special Modifications Sourcebook for details.

Mod.MiscDesc: Upgrade the difficulty Computers and Skulduggery checks made to gain unauthorized access to the ship twice.
Add [SE] to Computers and Skulduggery checks made to gain unauthorized access to the ship

ItemAttachment.Name: Slicing Computer
ItemAttachment.Description: [H3]Slicing Computer[h3] Please see page 67 of the Special Modifications Sourcebook for details.

Mod.MiscDesc: Counts as slicer gear that can be used by one passenger.
Add automatic [AD] to Computers checks made to slice enemy ships' systems.

ItemAttachment.Name: Pannier Modular Cargo Handling System
ItemAttachment.Description: [H3]Pannier Modular Cargo Handling System[h3] Please see page 46 of the Savage Spirits Sourcebook for details.

ItemAttachment.Name: XV-09 Chemical Restraint Harness
ItemAttachment.Description: [H3]XV-09 Chemical Restraint Harness[h3] Please see page 44 of the Stay on Target Sourcebook for details.

ItemAttachment.Description: [H3]Riding Tack[h3] Please see page 47 of the Savage Spirits Sourcebook for details.

ItemAttachment.Description: [H3]Saddlebags[h3] Please see page 47 of the Savage Spirits Sourcebook for details.

ItemAttachment.Description: [H3]Beam Splitter[h3] Please see page 51 of the Forged in Battle Sourcebook for details.

ItemAttachment.Description: [H3]Built-In Blaster Sight[h3] Please see page 51 of the Forged in Battle Sourcebook for details.

ItemAttachment.Description: [H3]Sensor Unit[h3] Please see page 55 of the Forged in Battle Sourcebook for details.

ItemAttachment.Description: [H3]Oxygen Unit[h3] Please see page 55 of the Forged in Battle Sourcebook for details.

ItemAttachment.Description: [H3]Storage Unit[h3] Please see page 55 of the Forged in Battle Sourcebook for details.

Stun Damage +1

ItemAttachment.Description: [H3]Overcharged Power Cell[h3] Please see page 51 of the Endless Vigil Sourcebook for details.

Mod.MiscDesc: Wielder can spend [AD] from combat checks to increase damage by 1. GM can spend [TH][TH] to decrease damage by 1.

ItemAttachment.Description: [H3]Pistol Hilt[h3] Please see page 52 of the Endless Vigil Sourcebook for details.

Mod.MiscDesc: Adds a medium laser turret

ItemAttachment.Description: [H3]Paramilitary Walker[h3] Converts a walker to a paramilitary vehicle. Please see page 71 of the Dangerous Covenants Sourcebook for details.

Mod.MiscDesc: Adds a forward medium laser cannon

ItemAttachment.Name: Paramilitary Wheeled/Tracked
ItemAttachment.Description: [H3]Paramilitary Wheeled/Tracked[h3] Converts a wheeled or tracked vehicle to a paramilitary vehicle. Please see page 71 of the Dangerous Covenants Sourcebook for details.

ItemAttachment.Name: Podracer Ejection System
ItemAttachment.Description: [H3]Podracer Ejection System[h3] Please see page 58 of the Endless Vigil Sourcebook for details.

Mod.MiscDesc: To eject, make an [B]Average ([DI][DI]) Piloting (Planetary) check[b] as an out-of-turn incidental. On success, pilot is ejected unharmed. On failure, pilot suffers vehicle speed in strain, plus one Critical Injury. GM can spend [TH][TH] or [DE] to cause wounds to be suffered instead.

Mod.MiscDesc: Ejects debris into the air behind podracer. Any racer within close range and behind must make a [B]Hard ([DI][DI][DI]) Piloting (Planetary) check[b] to avoid debris. Failure reduces speed by 1 for 2 rounds, plus 1 round per [TH]. [TH][TH][TH] or [DE] can inflict Critical Hit on target vehicle.
May only be used once per race.
